snippet: Judge David Barker of Clark County District Court sentenced a man on Monday to four to 10 years in prison for setting fire to a pet shop where 27 puppies and dogs were rescued after sprinklers doused flames.
abstract: Judge David Barker of Clark County District Court sentences Nevada man Kirk Bills to four to 10 years in prison for setting fire to a pet shop where 27 puppies and dogs were rescued after sprinklers doused flames; says he acted in tandem with Gloria Eun Hye Lee, who was sentenced to prison.
lead_paragraph: Judge David Barker of Clark County District Court sentenced a man on Monday to four to 10 years in prison for setting fire to a pet shop where 27 puppies and dogs were rescued after sprinklers doused flames.

headline.main: Nevada: Prison for Pet Shop Arsonist
headline.print_headline: Nevada: Prison for Pet Shop Arsonist
